name: Solar Grenade
description: A grenade that creates a flare of Solar Light which continually damages enemies trapped inside.

name: Glide
description: Jump and then press again while in the air to activate Glide.

name: Radiance
description: Fill yourself with Solar Light, dramatically increasing the effectiveness of all your abilities.

name: Scorch
description: A powerful melee attack that Ignites enemies, causing damage over time.

name: Arcane Wisdom
description: Training focused on battle recovery and speed.

name: Radiant Will
description: Increases the duration of Radiance.

name: Ancestral Order
description: Training focused on all attributes.

name: Touch of Flame
description: All grenades Ignite enemies, causing damage over time.

name: Firebolt Grenade
description: A grenade that unleashes bolts of Solar Light at nearby enemies.

name: Focused Control
description: Upgrades Glide for better directional control while in the air.

name: Song of Flame
description: While active, Radiance reduces all cooldowns for nearby allies.

name: Flame Shield
description: Damaging an enemy with Scorch reduces incoming damage for a short time.

name: Arcane Spirit
description: Training focused on battle recovery and toughness.

name: Viking Funeral
description: Enemies you Ignite burn longer and take more damage.

name: Chaos Order
description: Training focused on raw speed.

name: Angel of Light
description: Aiming your weapon while in the air will hold you in place for a short time.

name: Fusion Grenade
description: An explosive grenade that causes bonus damage when attached to its target.

name: Focused Burst
description: Upgrades Glide to provide an initial boost of speed.

name: Radiant Skin
description: While active, Radiance reduces incoming damage.

name: Solar Wind
description: Hitting an enemy with Scorch knocks them back.

name: Arcane Force
description: Training focused on toughness and speed.

name: Sunburst
description: Killing an enemy with Scorch has a chance to generate Orbs of Light.

name: Divine Order
description: Training focused on toughness at all costs.

name: Gift of the Sun
description: Gain an additional grenade.

name: Balanced Glide
description: Upgrades Glide to provide bonuses to both speed and control.

name: Fireborn
description: Radiance can now be activated from beyond the grave. Doing so returns you to life.

name: Brimstone
description: Killing enemies with Scorch causes them to explode.
